           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Assessing authoritativeness
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22048686">
          <div id="boxatt22048686" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25506226">
              <a id="link_25506226" href="http://macaulay.cuny.edu/eportfolios/libman2014/files/2014/01/Lidia-Marte.pdf" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25506226,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25506226}); ">

              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25506227">
              <a id="link_25506227" href="http://www.dominicancooking.com/recipes/traditional-dominican" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25506227,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25506227}); ">
               Exhibit B
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">

       <div id="wrapbox17345823">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345823">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345823">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works (starting places)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345823">
          <p>
           Cultural and food encyclopedias in/via Trexler Library
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 60px;">
           <a target="_blank" href="http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/eToc.do?rcDocId=GALE%7CCX3273300077&amp;inPS=true&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;resultClickType=AboutThisPublication&amp;contentModuleId=GVRL&amp;searchType=BasicSearchForm&amp;docId=GALE%7C1VIM">
            <em>
             Gale Encyclopedia of Multicultural America
            </em>
           </a>
           <br />
           <em>
            American Immigrant Cultures&nbsp;
           </em>
           (Ref. Collection 305.800973 L657a)
           <br />
           <a target="_blank" href="http://link.worldcat.org/?bKey=10.1093%2Facref%2F9780195154375.001.0001%2Facref-9780195154375&amp;rft.institution_id=2547&amp;pkgName=oro&amp;rft.oclcnum=53476629&amp;linkclass=to_article&amp;provider=OUP&amp;title=Oxford+Encyclopedia+of+Food+and+Drink+in+America&amp;rft.content=ebook%2Cvideo%2Caudio%2Cimage&amp;linkScheme=oup.highwire&amp;isbn=9780195154375&amp;jHome=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.oxfordreference.com%2Fview%2F10.1093%2Facref%2F9780195154375.001.0001%2Facref-9780195154375&amp;rfr_id=info%2Fsid%3Aoclc.org%2FWCL&amp;rft.order_by=preference&amp;localstem=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3D&amp;linktype=best">
            <em>
             Oxford Encyclopedia of Food and Drink in America
            </em>
           </a>
           (Ref. Collection 641.3003)
           <br />
           <a target="_blank" href="http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/eToc.do?rcDocId=GALE%7CCX1513300127&amp;inPS=true&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;resultClickType=AboutThisPublication&amp;contentModuleId=GVRL&amp;searchType=BasicSearchForm&amp;docId=GALE%7C4RCQ">
            <em>
             Food Cultures of the World Encyclopedia
            </em>
           </a>
           <br />
           <em>
            <a target="_blank" href="http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/i.do?isbn=9780684315904&amp;v=2.1&amp;u=mul_coll&amp;it=BIourl&amp;p=GVRL&amp;sw=w">
             Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
             <br />
            </a>
           </em>
           <em>
            <a target="_blank" href="http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/eToc.do?rcDocId=GALE%7CCX3403400153&amp;inPS=true&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;resultClickType=AboutThisPublication&amp;contentModuleId=GVRL&amp;searchType=BasicSearchForm&amp;docId=GALE%7C5CJU">
             Encyclopedia of Food and Culture
             <br />
            </a>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0PFC">
             Countries and Their Cultures
            </a>
           </em>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17345823" class="boxatt">

       <div id="wrapbox17345825">

         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345825">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345825">
          <div id="boxatt17345825" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24826540">
              <a id="link_24826540" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/748340033?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24826540,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24826540}); ">
               Cambridge History of World Food
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Research essays on the development of cuisine globally.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24826825">
              Culture and Customs of Colombia
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library, level C, call # 986.1063 W726c
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24826831">
              Culture and Customs of Peru
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library, level C, call # 985.06 F383c
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24826817">
              <a id="link_24826817" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/41256263?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24826817,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24826817}); ">
               Culture and Customs of the Dominican Republic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library call # 972.93 B878c
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22702181">
              <a id="link_22702181" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22702181,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417968">
              <a id="link_20417968" href="http://www.google.com/books" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417968,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378397}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Portions of the text of many books can be found here.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24826675">
              <a id="link_24826675" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/220905292?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24826675,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24826675}); ">
               Latino Food Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               1: Historical overview -- 2: Major foods and ingredients -- 3: Cooking -- 4: Meals -- 5: Eating out -- 6: Special occasions -- 7: Diet and health -- Glossary -- Resource guide -- Bibliography -- Index.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>

       <div id="wrapbox17345826">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345826">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345826">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Periodical articles (popular and scholarly)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345826">
          <div id="boxatt17345826" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20418064">
              <a id="link_20418064" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/morningcall/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418064,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12600323}); ">
               Morning Call
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive from early 1980s to yesterday.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417969">
              <a id="link_20417969" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417969,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals from every discipline. Includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417972">
              <a id="link_20417972" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417972,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               U.S. history and culture journal articles.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20418069">
              <a id="link_20418069" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418069,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Broad-based access to scholarly journal articles, especially when connecting to campus journal holdings.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417971">
              <a id="link_20417971" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417971,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database for non-U.S. history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19399903">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19399903">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19399903">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Statistical data
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19399903">
          <div id="boxatt19399903" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22702315">
              <a id="link_22702315" href="http://factfinder2.census.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22702315,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13916782}); ">
               American Factfinder
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database from the U.S. Census Bureau with population, housing, and business statistics at the country, state, county, city, and zip code levels.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22702336">
              <a id="link_22702336" href="http://www.pewhispanic.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22702336,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22702336}); ">
               Pew Hispanic Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The center conducts public opinion polling, demographic studies, media content analysis and other empirical social science research. Pew Research does not take positions on any of the issues it covers or on policy debates.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17345827">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345827">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345827">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345827">
          <div id="boxatt17345827" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24826548">
              <a id="link_24826548" href="https://www.google.com/advanced_search" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24826548,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24817116}); ">
               Advanced Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Allows limit by domain, such as .edu.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21404519">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21404519">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21404519">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Local guides
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21404519">
          <div id="boxatt21404519" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24899599">
              <a id="link_24899599" href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/2015_HISPANIC_RESOURCES_IN_THE_LEHIGH_VALLEY.pdf" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24899599,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cuisine as Culture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24899599}); ">
               Hispanic Resource in the Lehigh Valley
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Resource list created by Dr. Erika Sutherland.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4707922" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17345828">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345828">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345828">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Creating a bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345828">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a target="_blank" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a target="_blank" href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17345828" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17345829">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17345829">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17345829">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345829">
          <p>
           Books and journal articles can be requested from another library via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17345829" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
